review: I put the Amazon Fire box for my downstairs TV and loved it but also wanted to watch TV in my bedroom but not spend another $100.  The Fire TV Stick at $35 couldn't be better.  The picture is perfect - I get my Netflix movies and my Amazon Prime stuff with no complaints.  Other than the voice remote for the Amazon Fire, I really don't see any difference in the two devices.  Buy it, you won't be sorry.
author: Cheer Mom "cheermom"
